title: Visual RPG Studio v1.98.2 - 2D 3D Game Engine and Editor
description:
LastEnd Visual RPG Studio (VRS) gives you the power to create your own game without any special knowledge or training. All you need is a computer an a imagination, and your on the way to making your own game. This 2D / 3D game engine and editor for Windows can support many types of games not just RPG (Role Playing Games); because of its open project template system. 


Core Features 
-Custom Collision
-Visual Lua Scripting
-Supports Xbox 360 Controller
-Premade Custom Interfaces
-Customizable Workspace
-Project Templates
-Easy Multilingual Deployment
-2x64 Bit Encrypted Resources
-Auto Updater
-User Interface Editor

 2D Features 
-Large Maps
-1 to 10 Layers
-Unlimited Tile-sets
-Unlimited Animated Tiles
-Built-in Animation Tools

3D Features
-Large Maps
-Dynamic Shadows
-Blended Terrain
